sections.heading: Definitions, where found.For purposes of sections 77-3501 to 77-3529, unless the context otherwise requires, the definitions found in sections 77-3501
sections.text: 01 to 77-3505.06 shall be used.SourceLaws 1979, LB 65, § 1;Laws 1984, LB 809, § 1;Laws 1987, LB 376A, § 1;Laws 1989, LB 84, § 7;Laws 1994, LB 902, §
